sen.j: 大原大刀自（おおはらのおおとじ、生没年不詳）は、藤原鎌足の子。
sen.e: OHARA no Otoji (date of birth and death unknown) was a daughter of FUJIWARA no Kamatari.
OHARA no Otoji (year of birth and death unknown) was a daughter of FUJIWARA no Kamatari.
OHARA no Otoji (year of birth and death unknown) was a daughter of FUJIWARA no Kamatari.

sen.j: 五百重娘（いおえのいらつめ）、藤原夫人（ふじわらのおおとじ／ふじわらぶにん）とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: She was also called Ioe no iratsume, or FUJIWARA no Otoji (Bunin FUJIWARA).
She was also called Ioe no iratsume, or FUJIWARA no Otoji (Bunin FUJIWARA).
She was also called Ioe no iratsume, or FUJIWARA no Otoji (Bunin FUJIWARA).

sen.j: 藤原不比等・氷上大刀自の妹。
sen.e: She was a younger sister of FUJIWARA no Fuhito, HIKAMI no Otoji.
She was a younger sister of FUJIWARA no Fuhito, HIKAMI no Otoji.
She was a younger sister of FUJIWARA no Fuhito, HIKAMI no Otoji.

sen.j: 天武天皇の夫人で新田部親王の母。
sen.e: She was a Bunin/Fujin (consort of the emperor) of the Emperor Temmu, and was Imperial Prince Niitabe's mother.
She was a Bunin/Fujin (consort of the emperor) of the Emperor Temmu, and was Imperial Prince Niitabe's mother.
sen.cmt: 全角の’を半角にしました。
sen.e: She was a Bunin/Fujin (consort of the emperor) of the Emperor Temmu, and was Imperial Prince Niitabe's mother.

sen.j: 天武天皇の没後、異母兄である藤原不比等の妻となり、藤原麻呂を生む。
sen.e: After the death of the Emperor Temmu, she became her older paternal half-brother, FUJIWARA no Fuhito's wife, and gave birth to FUJIWARA no Maro.
After the death of the Emperor Temmu, she became her older paternal half-brother, FUJIWARA no Fuhito's wife, and gave birth to FUJIWARA no Maro.
sen.cmt: 全角の’を半角にしました。
sen.e: After the death of the Emperor Temmu, she became her older paternal half-brother, FUJIWARA no Fuhito's wife, and gave birth to FUJIWARA no Maro.
2 Tanka (thirty-one syllables' poem) poems (2-104, 8-1465) were complied into the "Manyoshu" (the oldest anthology of tanka).
2 tanka (thirty-one syllables' poem) poems (2-104, 8-1465) were complied into the "Manyoshu" (the oldest anthology of tanka).
sen.cmt: tanka小文字にしました。全角の’、”を半角にしました。
